Posts.Content: Oct 20, 2007 03:51PM - edited Oct 20, 2007 03:52PM by katpaf Report the creep to the local medical association.  Your care was worse than substandard.  Most definitely there should have been a nurse in there with you.  The lack of attention to post op care is inexcusable.  I won't even 'go there' with his bedside manner! Get all of your records from him and never go there again.  I'm praying for good results~!
